properties.Name: McDonald's
properties.Notes: An international symbol of capitalism may not be the first thing that comes to mind when thinking about running, but it can be a great spot to rehydrate or grab a quick bite after your run.

properties.Name: Bistro Box
properties.Notes: Well-stocked vending machines with drinks and snacks, but the real highlight is the 24/7 mini pizza machine. A bit pricey, but when everything else is closed at night, it’s a lifesaver.
